author: Staff Reporter
text:
Police department have auctioned 19 motor vehicles that were seized from prohibition offenders.

The department has announced that 35 vehicles would be auctioned on Monday. However, due to pendency of certain procedures only 32 vehicles could be auctioned. Around 77 persons paid each Rs.100 as entry fee and participated. Around 19 vehicles were sold out for Rs.4,15,541.

The remaining 13 vehicles will be re auctioned later, sources said.
title: 19 seized vehicles auctioned
